fields.name: One month subscription
fields.description: This is a subscription for one month. It provides your team with full access to all features for 30 days.
fields.additional_info: Good option if you just want to try!

fields.name: Six months subscription
fields.description: This is a subscription for six months. Your team can use all our features for 180 days. It's also cheaper than paying monthly.
fields.additional_info: Popular in companies with less than 20 employees.

fields.name: One year subscription
fields.description: This is a subscription for 12 months. Your team can use all features on our website, and you are saving Â£120 comparing to monthly payment offer.
fields.additional_info: This is the most popular option between our clients.
